casebody.data:
No. 09-11378 (09A1222). Ronnie Lee Gardner, Petitioner v. Utah. 560 U.S. 981, 130 S. Ct. 3450,

177 L. Ed. 2d 354,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 4977. June 17, 2010.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to Justice Sotomayor, and by her referred to the Court, denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Utah denied.

Justice Stevens and Justice Breyer would grant the application for stay of execution. See Johnson v. Bredesen, 558 U.S. 1067, 1067-1068, 130 S. Ct. 541, 175 L. Ed. 2d 552 (2009) (Stevens, J., joined by Breyer, J., respecting denial of certiorari).

Same case below, 234 P.3d 1104 and 234 P.3d 1115.
